thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Phyllis
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Phyllis

author: Phyllis
title: Phyllis
text:
I loved walking into a furniture store and not being completely bombarded with sales people. Yes, they greeted us but allowed us to look around without hovering over us.
I purchased the St. James coffee table, end table, and sofa table, and they are GORGEOUS!!! I couldn't be more happy with my purchase.
Plan to purchase my dinning room set soon.
